desc: Invel pioneer in products with MIG3 Bioceramic far-infrared technology, beneficial to health, increases localized nitric oxide production that improves oxygenation and blood flow assisting in the removal of pro-inflammatory subs, muscle relaxation helping you sleep better, and enhancing the appearance of Skin

layout.text: Bioceramic MIG3 Technology increases localized nitric oxide production that improves oxygenation and blood flow assisting in the removal of pro-inflammatory substances, known to cause aching sensations.
